Northridge, 2014, violated code 103.

while a child's birthday party was unfolding next door,

translation.en: Critical injury sustained.
He already had g… gout. He had gout.

translation.it: Un dente scheggiato, di una femmina… Sei, setto, otto.

translation.en: Appears to be an almost Elder, roughly 90 years old.
translation.it: Quasi una vecchia, di circa 90 anni.

translation.en: Ninety? You probably need to check that again.
-You sure it's 90? -I'm sure.
Okay, whatever.
Full price still, right?
I'm sorry. Code 107 in the book clearly states anything--
translation.it: Mi spiace, ma secondo il codice 107 del regolamento…

translation.en: Enough of the codes. It's fine.
-That's the net for the teeth. -Yeah, I'll come in… Hey!
translation.it: - Questo è il netto per i denti. - Dopotutto sono… Ehi!

translation.en: However, due to the truncated processing time,
translation.it: Ma, per via dei suoi precedenti lavorativi,

translation.en: Mr. Seeger would like me to inform you we need your dues up front,
translation.it: Seeger mi ha chiesto di decurtarle le tasse in anticipo.

translation.en: which, of course, is $5,000.
$5,000? I thought it was two?
Those are 2017 rates, Mr. Jablonski.
Then there is 15% off the top of every fang,
translation.it: Poi va decurtato il 15% per ogni canino,

translation.en: and we have to hold 50% until we receive your paperwork.
translation.it: e tratteniamo il 50% finché non riceveremo i suoi documenti.

translation.en: And, of course, $10 for your membership card,
translation.it: Poi ci sono i 10 dollari della tessera associativa,

translation.en: which gets you one free app at Cheesecake Factory.
translation.it: ma così avrà un buono da Cheesecake Factory.

translation.en: -I don't like cheesecake. -Do you have that?
Why won't you take the $10 out of that? Taking everything else.
translation.it: Perché non li prendi da lì?

translation.en: You don't have cash on you? You really wanna make me split this?
translation.it: Non ha contanti? Vuole che le cambi questi?

translation.en: Okay, you are good to go.
Am I?
If you have any issues with this,
Carol right here would be happy to further assist you.
Oh, great. I see you met your Union rep.
translation.it: Hai conosciuto il tuo rappresentante dell'Unione.

translation.en: What?
[John] Come on, Bud.
Sir, please.
That new girl's a smoke show.
Right, but I'm begging you to reconsider. I'm not meant for the field.
translation.it: Ok, ma ci ripensi. Non sono adatto alle missioni.

translation.en: I just bought an ergonomic chair with my own money. I'm all in on the desk.
translation.it: Ho comprato una sedia ergonomica. Sono adatto alla scrivania.

translation.en: That's why I need you out there with him. Right? Someone who knows the codes to the letter.
translation.it: Per questo ti voglio con lui. Conosci il regolamento alla lettera.

translation.en: -Okay, but-- -Hey, hey, hey.
Do you wanna move up here?
You gotta get your ass out in the field. All right?
translation.it: Devi portare il culo sul campo.

translation.en: Think about it this way, you're gonna be my eyes and ears, my friend.
translation.it: Vedila così. Sarai i miei occhi e le mie orecchie.

translation.en: -Right? -Right--
And the minute he messes up, the minute he goes against code,
translation.it: E, appena farà un passo falso o violerà il codice,

translation.en: you'll be there reporting it back to me, right?
translation.it: tu farai rapporto a me, capito?

translation.en: The sooner he fucks up, the sooner your sweet cheeks are in Carol's desk.
translation.it: Prima lui farà qualche casino, prima tu avrai la scrivania di Carol.

translation.en: You work out?
-A little. -Yeah, thought so.
You're late.
Close it.
I was actually here an hour ago, but you weren't, so I went to go get us breakfast.
translation.it: In realtà sono arrivato un'ora fa, ma non c'eri e ho preso la colazione.

translation.en: I got you an organic, gluten-free, paleo bran muffin.
translation.it: Ti ho preso un muffin biologico senza glutine.

translation.en: Really? Thank you.
-I was starving. -That was a six-dollar muffin.
translation.it: - Morivo di fame. - È costato sei dollari.

translation.en: -What do you have on? -What?
-What are you wearing? -Just, like, normal clothes.
The handbook says blend in on the hunt. Be inconspicuous.
translation.it: Il manuale suggerisce di non dare nell'occhio.

translation.en: You have on a suit. How's that inconspicuous?
translation.it: E un completo non dà nell'occhio?

translation.en: You have on a suit. We're in the Valley. In the summertime.
translation.it: Indossi un completo d'estate nella valle.

translation.en: -It's a summery suit. -A summery suit?
-Juniper green. Yes. -What is juniper green?
A hue of green I found to be complementary against my skin tone.
translation.it: È una tonalità di verde adatta al mio incarnato.

translation.en: Whatever it is, don't wear it again.
Look, I'll put myself together, and we'll take off, all right?
translation.it: Finisco di prepararmi e andiamo, ok?

translation.en: -Do you have somewhere I can hang this? -Yep.
translation.it: - Hai un posto dove appendere questa? - Sì.

translation.en: Not there.
I'll just… hold on to it.
This ain't gonna last.
Got enough weapons and ammo in here to take down El Jefe, huh?
translation.it: Hai abbastanza armi e munizioni per eliminare El Jefe.

translation.en: [chuckles] What you know about El Jefe?
translation.it: Cosa ne sai di El Jefe?

translation.en: Oh, come on. Legendary 700-year-old European vampire.
translation.it: Avanti. È un leggendario vampiro europeo di 700 anni.

translation.en: Some say he's at the top of the LA drug trade, just waiting for his moment to reemerge.
translation.it: Per alcuni gestisce il traffico di droga in attesa di riemergere.

translation.en: Fangs so sharp, with just one, you could buy a mansion in Bel Air.
translation.it: Con un suo canino, ci puoi comprare una villa a Bel Air.

translation.en: You sound like Big John.
Whole lot of gibberish. You know that's a crock of shit, right?
translation.it: Vi piace blaterare. Sai che sono solo stronzate, vero?

translation.en: I didn't take you for an arts and crafts guy.
translation.it: Non mi sembravi uno da artigianato. Cosa sono?

translation.en: -What are these all about? -Wanna keep your hands off my shit?
translation.it: Non mi sembravi uno da artigianato. Cosa sono? Non toccare la mia roba.

translation.en: It's my trophy case.
For each one that I kill, I, uh… They're already dead, but you get my drift.
translation.it: Per ogni vampiro che uccido… Sono già morti, ma hai capito.

translation.en: 'Cause they're allergic to wood. Smart.
translation.it: Sai che sono allergici al legno.

translation.en: They're allergic to wood, but not just any wood. It's mpingo wood.
translation.it: Sono allergici solo al legno di mpingo.

translation.en: The strongest African hardwood. Not that Ikea shit.
translation.it: Il più robusto d'Africa. Non la merda dell'IKEA.

translation.en: We mix it with the garlic. The wooden bullets pierce the heart.
translation.it: Lo mescoliamo con l'aglio. Il legno buca il cuore

translation.en: -The silver-- -Silver to the throat. Right.
Yeah. Cuts the head off… usually.
translation.it: Esatto. Serve a decapitarli… di solito.

translation.en: Usually. Right, you are referring to Uber Vamps,
translation.it: Di solito. Ti riferisci ai Super Vampiri.

translation.en: who have come back from decapitation.
[Bud] Not if you blast the heart with wood before you cut their throats with silver.
translation.it: Non se li trafiggi col legno prima di decapitarli con l'argento.

translation.en: Mm-hmm. You also forgot to mention that you can kill them by burning them.
translation.it: Hai dimenticato che si possono uccidere anche bruciandoli.

translation.en: I didn't forget anything. That's how I get my money.
translation.it: Lo so bene, ma è uno spreco di soldi.

translation.en: Why would I burn the fangs? I don't do that.
translation.it: Perché dovrei bruciare i loro canini?

translation.en: Listen, Guacamole Suit,
right there on the shelf, grab that for me.
Get that, we'll take off.
And remember, whatever you do, don't… drop my shit.
translation.it: E, qualunque cosa tu faccia, ricorda… di non far cadere la mia roba.

translation.en: So, uh, where we going?
I'm going hunting. I don't know about you.
translation.it: Io vado a caccia. Tu non lo so.

translation.en: Why you wearing the seat belt like that?
translation.it: Perché hai messo la cintura così?

translation.en: I mean, usually the seat belts aren't like this complicated and heavy. But--
translation.it: È una cintura di sicurezza piuttosto pesante e complicata.

translation.en: It's not complicated. It's just a seat belt. It protects you.
translation.it: Non è complicata. È una cintura. Ti protegge.

translation.en: Sure.
Sure. It's still protecting me though. If anything happened, it's just--
translation.it: Sì, ma mi protegge anche così. Se dovesse succedere qualcosa…

translation.en: See? It still catches me.
I see.
It's gonna be a long day.
So, are you gonna tell me what we're doing at an animal shelter?
translation.it: Vuoi dirmi perché siamo in un rifugio per animali?

translation.en: I'm gonna tell you shit.
What you know about Juvies?
Juvies or Juveniles, AKA Zombie Vamps,
formed when an already young vamp turns somebody else.
Instead of the strength of a full vamp,
translation.it: Più deboli di un normale vampiro,

translation.en: they lack regenerative abilities and appear more dead than alive.
translation.it: non sanno rigenerarsi e sembrano più morti che vivi.

translation.en: They can't process human blood yet, so what do they do?
translation.it: Non digeriscono ancora il sangue umano, quindi?

translation.en: -I'm aware. -They feed off of small animals, rodents.
So you've read the book?
I don't have to read it. I'm out here.
What do you know about different species of vampires?
translation.it: Che mi dici delle varie specie di vampiro?

translation.en: I know there are five types. Southern, Eastern, Spider, Uber, and Juvenile.
translation.it: Ne esistono cinque. Meridionali, Orientali, Ragno, Super e Junior.

translation.en: They are largely solitary, but when together, there is a hierarchy.
translation.it: Sono solitari ma, se sono insieme, hanno una gerarchia.

translation.en: They organize by age. What else?
The sunlight is the only thing they're scared of.
translation.it: Temono solo la luce del sole.

translation.en: They can't reproduce, but they can turn people. Should I continue?
translation.it: Non possono riprodursi, ma possono trasformare gli altri.

translation.en: -What about familiars? -You think this guy's one of them?
translation.it: - E i servi? - Quello è un servo?

translation.en: I don't know. You tell me.
-Hmm? -I think he fits the profile.
-You think so? -Absolutely.
More powerful vamps have more powerful familiars.
translation.it: I vampiri potenti hanno servi potenti.

translation.en: And when it comes to Juvies, a little kid like this,
translation.it: E, trattandosi di Junior, un ragazzo così

translation.en: he's probably grabbing those cats for 'em, try to get 'em turned.
translation.it: probabilmente prende i gatti per loro, per trasformarli.

translation.en: -Oh man. -What?
No, I'm just a big cat lover. I got two of them myself.
translation.it: È che amo molto i gatti. Ne ho due.

translation.en: Well, that explains it.
-Want to see a picture? -No, I don't.
Maybe later.
All right. Here we go.
[Bud] There's his car.
Canoga Bowl. Closed for 18 months.
It's perfect.
-Can I offer some advice? -No.
I mean, economically speaking, why go after Juvies?
translation.it: Economicamente parlando, perché uccidere un Junior

translation.en: Why not let them ripen, come back when their teeth are valuable?
translation.it: e non tornare quando i denti varranno qualcosa?

translation.en: I could come back in September, but right now, I'm out of time.
translation.it: Potrei tornare a settembre, ma ora non ho tempo.

translation.en: And beggars can't be choosers.
Plus, you don't want these things biting people, do you?
translation.it: E poi potrebbe mordere qualcuno, no?

translation.en: Wait. Why don't you have time?
-Why you ask me so many questions? -I'm just--
Just stay in the truck and do your business.
Stay in the truck? No, I have to be with you at all times in the field.
translation.it: Nel furgone? No, io devo sempre seguirti sul campo.

translation.en: -Union rules. -Other than keeping you alive,
translation.it: Sono le regole. Non me ne frega un cazzo.

translation.en: I don't give a shit about rules.
translation.it: Non me ne frega un cazzo.

translation.en: No, no, you don't understand. All times.
You're gonna stay in this car. With that in mind, here.
translation.it: Tu resta nel furgone. Comunque, tieni.

translation.en: -What? No, I don't believe in guns. -You don't believe in 'em?
translation.it: - Cosa? No, io non credo nelle pistole. - Come?

translation.en: No, they're amoral. They're killing machines. They're not for me.
translation.it: Sono amorali. Uccidono la gente. Non fanno per me.

translation.en: When I was a kid, I tried shooting a squirrel with a BB gun,
translation.it: Da piccolo provai a sparare a uno scoiattolo

translation.en: and I just couldn't. All right?
I still have nightmares where I can see his little face
making little squirrel noises, and I still have nightmares about it.
translation.it: e sento i suoi versi nei miei incubi.

translation.en: Made squirrel noises, huh?
-What does a squirrel noise sound like? -It's like…
translation.it: - E che verso fa lo scoiattolo? - Direi…

translation.en: Whatever! I don't wanna talk about it.
Stay in the truck.
It's impossible.
How the hell can you be here? It's daytime.
translation.it: Come cazzo fai a essere qui? È giorno.

translation.en: You've been a bad boy, Troy.
Did you know that a vampire cannot live without its fangs?
translation.it: Sapevi che un vampiro non può vivere senza canini?

translation.en: And yet, for whatever reason, whatever cruel joke from the gods…
translation.it: Eppure, per uno scherzo crudele degli dei…

translation.en: they are the one thing we cannot regenerate.
translation.it: è l'unica cosa che non possiamo rigenerare.

translation.en: Everything that makes a vampire a predator
translation.it: Tutto ciò che ci rende dei predatori

translation.en: is in its fangs.
Each set is a life that could have lived a thousand lives.
translation.it: Ogni coppia è una vita che poteva vivere mille vite.

translation.en: Lives that you had a part in ending.
translation.it: Vite che hai contribuito a spezzare.

translation.en: Yet it wasn't always like this, you know?
translation.it: Ma non è sempre stato così, sai?

translation.en: There was a time when you humans, you worshiped us as gods.
translation.it: Un tempo voi umani ci veneravate come divinità.

translation.en: Right here in this valley, you built temples of blood and bone to honor us.
translation.it: Qui nella valle avete costruito templi di sangue e ossa per onorarci.

translation.en: And then you turned on us.
Well, guess what?
I'm gonna take back what's ours,
translation.it: Io mi riprenderò ciò che è nostro,

translation.en: one property at a time.
The way I see it, you have two choices, two doors.
translation.it: Per come la vedo io, hai due possibilità, due porte tra cui scegliere.

translation.en: One, you bend the knee and join me in service, and you live.
translation.it: Nel primo caso, ti prostri a me, mi aiuti e sopravvivi.

translation.en: And two…
you don't.
All right. So, what the hell do you want? Huh?
Who brought you this tooth?
translation.it: Chi ti ha portato questo dente?

translation.en: A name.
You're so full of shit, lady.
You think you're a god?
You're not gods. You're a big mistake.
translation.it: Non siete divinità. Siete un errore.

translation.en: You're a genetic mutation that would've died out
translation.it: Una mutazione genetica che si sarebbe estinta,

translation.en: if there hadn't been a stinking hole for y'all to crawl into.
translation.it: se non aveste avuto un buco puzzolente dove rintanarvi.

translation.en: Door number two it is.
No. No! [echoing] No!
Time for the tooth fairy.
translation.it: È arrivata la fata dei denti.

translation.en: Hello, sir.
How are we on this fine morning?
Any violations to report?
He is certainly heading that way,
but nothing verified quite yet.
translation.it: ma per ora non ne ho ancora verificate.

translation.en: Well, where is he now?
He left me in the car and went into a bowling alley.
translation.it: Mi ha lasciato nel furgone ed è in una sala da bowling.

translation.en: You didn't follow him?
I thought he was gonna shoot me! He's very difficult to reason with, sir.
translation.it: Temevo che mi sparasse. Non è facile ragionarci, signore.

translation.en: Kid! You want your promotion?
You want Carol's desk?
Then get off your ass, get in there, and verify those violations.
translation.it: Allora alza le chiappe, entra là dentro e verifica le violazioni!

translation.en: Ugh! Hair on your nipples!
-[Seth] Bud? -Seth!
-Seth! -Shit.
-Bud! -[Bud] Hurry up! Shoot it!
I… I don't have my gun!
-Give me my shotgun! -[snarling]
I'm… I'm just an observer!
Your gonna be hors d'œuvre if you don't give me that gun!
translation.it: Sarai un antipasto, se non mi passi il fucile!

translation.en: Shit! Shit! Shit!
Whoa! I'm sorry!
Next time I tell you, "Gimme that goddamn gun," you gimme that goddamn gun!
translation.it: Se ti dico "passami il fucile", me lo passi!

translation.en: -Now duck! -What?
I said duck!
You okay?
Oh, jeez. That was horrible.
These Juvie teeth ain't worth shit, but get enough of 'em…
translation.it: Questi non valgono nulla, ma, come dicevi,

translation.en: It's a number game like you said. Uh, you okay?
translation.it: averne un po' non guasta. Stai bene?

translation.en: What's going on?
Oh, come on. No, no, I'm not okay.
translation.it: Non ci credo. No, no che non sto bene.

translation.en: -All right? Look at me! -What?
Vampires just tried to kill me.
You put a gun in my face, and now I just pissed my favorite fucking suit!
translation.it: Tu mi hai puntato contro un'arma e ho pisciato nel mio completo preferito.

translation.en: Hey, hey. Relax. You did good in there. You did good in there.
translation.it: Ehi! Calma. Sei stato bravo là dentro.

translation.en: Besides, everybody pisses themselves the first time.
translation.it: Tutti si pisciano addosso la prima volta.

translation.en: -Really? -Yeah.
-Did you? -No, I… No, I didn't. But listen, you did.
translation.it: - Anche tu l'hai fatto? - Io no, ma tu sì.

translation.en: Here, dry your eyes. Dry your eyes, okay.
You know what?
Put it on me. My bad. We bit off more than we could chew today.
translation.it: È colpa mia. Abbiamo esagerato, come primo giorno.

translation.en: So why don't we go home, get some rest.
In the morning, we'll kick some motherfucking ass. Okay?
-Okay. -All right, come on.
Let's get in the car.
What the fuck is that? What'd you eat today?
translation.it: Che roba è quella? Cos'hai mangiato?

translation.en: You know what?
Let's have you get in the back. Don't want you to get that on my vintage seats.
translation.it: È meglio se sali dietro. Rovineresti i miei sedili vintage.

translation.en: -What, are you serious? -Damn right.
Come on. Gotta move.
Hang your leg out the back so we can air dry.
translation.it: Tieni le gambe fuori, così si asciugano i pantaloni.

translation.en: [Bud] Hey. Hey!
-You forgot your man-purse. -Wait. That's expens--
You gotta get some of this too.
I'm sure you know, Mr. Union Man. But when vamps are killed,
translation.it: Di certo lo saprai. Quando uccidi un vampiro,

translation.en: they release a gas that gets on you that other vamps can sniff out.
translation.it: ti lascia addosso un gas che gli altri vampiri sentono.

translation.en: So you gotta get all of that off. Here, take this.
It's my special blend, like a little, uh, skunk musk, okay?
translation.it: È una mia miscela speciale. Profumo muschiato.

translation.en: -Now, get that on you, in the shower. -Oh Jesus.
translation.it: Spalmatela addosso. - Oddio. - Nella doccia, su tutto il corpo.

translation.en: On every inch of you, okay?
translation.it: - Oddio. - Nella doccia, su tutto il corpo.

translation.en: Be extremely careful. Don't get it in your eyes.
And whatever you do,
don't get it in your butthole. What happens in the butthole?
translation.it: - evita il buco del culo. - Perché? Cosa fa?

translation.en: I mean, it can't kill you, but… Jesus Christ.
By the way, lock your doors, don't come out after dark, and, uh…
translation.it: Chiudi a chiave le porte, non uscire dopo il tramonto e…

translation.en: -Guess what? -What?
You're dried up.
Oh!
translation.it: OK. PASSA A PRENDERE PAIGE PER LA FESTA DI VENERDÌ.

translation.en: -[chuckles] Oh God. It's okay. -I'm sorry about that.
-No, no, me. I got it. -It's okay.
It's my fault. I couldn't see over my baskets.
I got it. This is a… You a… you a doctor?
translation.it: Faccio io. È… Sei un medico?

translation.en: Uh, nurse, actually.
Hope you don't think this is weird, but you got a lot of scrubs.
translation.it: Non per farmi gli affari tuoi, ma hai tanti camici.

translation.en: Yeah, I mean, I hate doing laundry, so I kind of just kept buying new ones.
translation.it: Sì. Odio fare il bucato e preferisco comprarli nuovi.

translation.en: -Got out of control. -Okay.
But, hey, new apartment. Why not start off on the right foot?
translation.it: Ma con la casa nuova potrei iniziare col piede giusto.

translation.en: Yeah. Well, welcome to the building. I'm right there in 20.
translation.it: Sì, beh, benvenuta nel palazzo. Io vivo all'appartamento 20.

translation.en: -Oh! Well, I'm Heather. I'm in 19. -Well, I'm Bud 20. [chuckles]
translation.it: - Io sono Heather e vivo al 19. - Io sono Bud 20.

translation.en: Can you help me with that, actually?
[Bud] Oh. Yeah.
-[Heather] Thanks. -Yeah, no problem.
-You can just put that down anywhere. -Sure. Okay.
translation.it: - Mettilo pure dove vuoi. - Certo. Ok.

translation.en: -See you've got a retro vibe poppin', huh? -Mm-hmm.
translation.it: Vedo che ti piace lo stile rétro.

translation.en: -Dig that. -Thanks.
I wish I had a beer or something to offer you.
translation.it: Vorrei avere una birra o altro da offrirti.

translation.en: Uh, a previous tenant left some ice cream in the freezer, if you're interested.
translation.it: Un ex inquilino ha lasciato del gelato in freezer, se vuoi.

translation.en: No, thanks. I'll take a rain check.
-You sure? -Yeah. Welcome to the building.
Thank you.
Feeling better?
Not really.
Got a little bit of that yellow stuff in my butthole.
translation.it: Mi è finita un po' di roba gialla nel sedere.

translation.en: It was so much worse than what you even described.
translation.it: È stato peggio di quanto dicevi.

translation.en: Bet it was.
You looking for something?
-Whoa. Hey, that's personal. -No, no, no.
"Violation code 101, terminated vamps and didn't report to the Union."
translation.it: "Violazione codice 101, non denuncia all'Unione i vampiri uccisi.

translation.en: "Violation code 276, breaking and entering without Union sanctions."
translation.it: Violazione codice 276, effrazione senza l'approvazione dell'Unione."

translation.en: -That did happen. -Violation. Violation. Violation.
Oh, look at this. "Needs to reimburse me for six-dollar muffin"?
translation.it: Guarda qua. "Mi deve rimborsare sei dollari per il muffin"?

translation.en: It's a standard part of Union procedure.
-I have to document everything. -It's not.
It's for Seeger to keep me out the Union. Ain't that great?
translation.it: Questo è per Seeger, per escludermi dall'Unione.

translation.en: You almost got me killed yesterday.
You almost got yourself killed yesterday.
I told you stay your punk-ass in the car. That's why I work by myself.
translation.it: Dovevi restare nel furgone. Per questo lavoro da solo.

translation.en: Listen. What? You're gonna die in the name of kissing your boss's ass?
translation.it: Sei disposto a morire pur di leccare il culo al capo?

translation.en: Well, he didn't give me a choice, okay?
translation.it: Non mi ha dato molta scelta, ok?

translation.en: Listen to me, Mr. Union Fellow.
I may not follow all the Union rules, but let me tell you something.
translation.it: Forse non seguo tutte le regole, ma sappi una cosa.

translation.en: If we went by the book, we'd both be dead by now!
translation.it: Se avessimo seguito il codice, saremmo morti.

translation.en: And you saw that yesterday.
Look. Just give me a couple of days.
translation.it: Ascolta. Concedimi solo un paio di giorni.

translation.en: Okay, a couple days.
So, what's on the agenda today?
Like every day.
Hunting vampires.
[Seth] Bud, what are we doing at a pawn shop?
translation.it: Che ci facciamo in un banco dei pegni?

translation.en: [Bud] This dude's cheap as shit, but he got goods we need in order to, uh…
